title: IUAC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 03 Stenographer and Other Posts
description: Inter University Accelerator Centre (IUAC) has declared the latest job notification for 03 Stenographer and Multi-Tasking Staff Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the IUAC Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply online before the last date. If you are looking for more, here is...
